DOC.brief_title: The Real-World Endeavor Resolute Versus XIENCE V Drug-Eluting Stent Study Twente
DOC.detailed_description: Primary research question To investigate whether clinical outcome follow randomize implantation Endeavor Resolute® versus XIENCE V® drug-eluting stent similar , assess non-inferiority set compare target-vessel failure ( TVF ) stent . We want compare drug-eluting stent combine endpoint death , myocardial infarction revascularization relate target-vessel , well death myocardial infarction relate significant flow obstruction another vessel another cause . According current literature , non-inferiority Endeavor resolute ® XIENCE V® expect . But non-inferiority Endeavor resolute XIENCE V® test control randomize trial yet .
